title: shree vENugOpaala
sahitya:
shrI vENugOpAla dEvA nI vAvA

anupallavi
 
kOvE nin maruga guha kumara gurupara SaNmukha kOvE mAvElar ishaikkuighavE
nin aruL perugavE

caraNam
 
mA nandagOpa kumArA vara brahmAnanda gItam taravAn anda mukhil vaNNa
mAlE nin nAma paramAnanda kavi kunjaradAsa nidhipOlE
